name: Drifty The Frog
description:
This game was made for the MiniJam106Frogs^2  72 hour game jam. This game and all code and assets were made within those 72 hours.

Note the web version must be played in Fullscreen.

'Arrow' keys or 'wasd' to move.
'Space' to drift.
'R' to reset round.

Pretend like you shouldn't go on the grass. Had some issues with slowing the player while on the grass, so there is technically no penalty for leaving the river.
